title: Diary of a Bad Blaze 2
description: This Minecraft diary is over 10,000 words with pictures to accompany the story. Blaze is back for his next adventure! Ever since he visited the Overworld, young Blaze has grown up a bit. He is not such a hothead as before; though, still enough to get him in trouble. Read this diary today to find out what kinds of trouble Blaze gets into. Disclaimer: This book is a work of fanfiction; it is not an official Minecraft book. It is not endorsed, authorized, licensed, sponsored, or supported by Mojang AB, Microsoft Corp. or any other entity owning or controlling rights to the Minecraft name, trademarks or copyrights.
